Uses of Class
marauroa.server.db.DBTransaction

  • Packages that use DBTransaction 
    Package Description
    marauroa.server.db
    This package contains low level database stuff.
    marauroa.server.db.command
    This package contains infrastructure for asynchronous database access.
    marauroa.server.game.container
    This package contains the classes that store information about players connected to server.
    marauroa.server.game.db
    high level database access.
    marauroa.server.game.dbcommand  

    • Uses of DBTransaction in marauroa.server.db

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DBTransaction TransactionPool.beginWork()
      starts a transaction and marks it as reserved
      Methods in marauroa.server.db with parameters of type DBTransaction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void TransactionPool.commit(DBTransaction dbtransaction)
      commits this transaction and frees its reservation
      void TransactionPool.killTransaction(DBTransaction dbtransaction)
      kills a transaction by rolling it back and closing it; it will be removed from the pool
      void TransactionPool.rollback(DBTransaction dbtransaction)
      rolls this transaction back and frees the reservation
      void UpdateScript.update(DBTransaction transaction)
      updates the structure of the database

      Constructor and Description

      creates a new JDBCSQLHelper
